segments.text: Next please ! Hello sir , may I see your passport please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you be checking any bags today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I ’ d like to check three pieces .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry , sir . Airline policy allows only two pieces of checked luggage , at twenty kilograms each , plus one piece of carry-on luggage . I will have to charge you extra for the additional suitcase .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? Why ! I am taking an intercontinental flight ! I ’ m flying sixteen thousand CMS ! How am I supposed to only take two , twenty kilo bags ? That ’ s absurd !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry , sir , there ’ s nothing I can do . You cannot board the flight with that large bag either.Carry - on bags must fit in the over-head compartment or under your seat . That bag is clearly too big .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now I see . You charge next to nothing for an international ticket , but when it comes to charging for any other small thing , you charge an arm and a leg ! So tell me , miss , how much will I have to pay for all of this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let ’ s see ... six hundred and twenty-five US dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s more than my round-trip ticket !
segments.speaker: S2
